description.value: This Dynatrace plugin can send incident messages to a webhook defined in Slack

property.label: URL
property.description: URL of the Slack channel where the incident message should be sent to. In order to get this URL, one needs to configure a WebHook for that channel to be able to receive external messages. This integration can easily be enabled in the Slack web UI.

property.label: Tag People
property.description: (optional) Space separated list of users to tag. eg. @adam @bob @charlie @diane

property.label: Linked Dashboard
property.description: Full name of dashboard to link to in alert. Blank = none
